s_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 - Battle Nexus
s_synopsis: The turtles are surrounded by a strange light and find themselves on a strange alien planet. After they rescue a robot who is hunted by soldiers and Triceratons, he tells them that he can help them get back home via the teleporter he built. Required for the vast distances however is the power of special crystals, so the four reptile dudes set out to collect them.
